getMobileRentalAvm

Overview

This call is used to fetch rental automated valuation model (RAVM) for residential property (Houses & Units) that includes the rental estimate, rental range, confidence score and forecast standard deviation (FSD) along with a list of comparable property IDs; it uses rental avm service under BSGv3.

BSGv3 BSGv2 Show Additional Data Elements
Yes No

Additional Information

For further reading regarding BSG Elements:

  • Rental AVM Service

Request

Parameters

Parameter Description Required
op Operation Yes
uid User ID Yes
sid Session ID Yes
propertyId Property Id Yes

Sample Request { "op": "getMobileRentalAvm", "uid": "TWISTUSER001", "sid": "2-4eed242594fc464787b8054ddc77de11", "propertyId": "3976640" }

Response

Success: { "response": { "status": "success", "result": { "rentalAvm": { "rentalAvmEstimate": "1230", "rentalAvmEstimateFsdScore": "42", "rentalAvmEstimateHigh": "1747", "rentalAvmEstimateLow": "712", "rentalAvmPeriod": "W", "rentalAvmRunDate": "13/11/2015", "rentalAvmScore": "29", "rentalAvmValuationDate": "02/11/2015", "rentalAvmYield": "3.86", "rentalAvmYieldFsdScore": "46", "comparableProperties": [ "3982980", "3983116", "3979948", "3987019", "3976917", "3976809" ] } } } }

Error: { "response": { "status": "error", "description": "error description" } }
